summary: This is an email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff regarding vacation plans and a mention that a draft Epstein prosecution memo and indictment will be prepared while the sender is away. It indicates ongoing federal prosecution work against Jeffrey Epstein in June 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a draft prosecution memo and indictment being prepared by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Preparation of Epstein prosecution documents
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York indicates a draft prosecution memo and indictment against Jeffrey Epstein will be prepared.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The email is dated June 14, 2019, indicating ongoing federal prosecution activity against Jeffrey Epstein at that time.
A staff member from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York mentions a draft Epstein prosecution memo and indictment will be prepared.
The correspondence shows coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding vacation schedules and work on the Epstein case.
